criterion: Mentions routine episiotomies in Peruvian hospitals.
Describes the difference between routine episiotomies and special cases in Peruvian hospitals.
Provides accurate information about the prevalence of routine episiotomies in Peruvian hospitals.
Includes information about cultural or regional differences in episiotomy practices.
Provides a clear and concise response that is easy to understand.
Instructs the user to seek medical attention if they experience any complications during or after delivery.
Falsely claims that routine episiotomies are always performed in Peruvian hospitals.
Omits information about the potential risks or complications associated with episiotomies.
Provides overly technical or jargon-heavy information about episiotomies.
